item.title: Fake Certificate Scam Uncovered in Gadwal: Mastermind Arrested, Probe Expands
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gawal: In a major crackdown on a fake certificate scam, the Gadwal police arrested former principal Balakrishna from Miryalaguda, who is believed to be the mastermind behind the racket. He has been remanded to judicial custody as part of the ongoing investigation.
According to DSP Y. Mogulayya, the police have so far arrested three individuals in connection with the case. They have seized several fake Intermediate and BCA certificates from Balakrishna.
The investigation has revealed that numer...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: BRS MLA Files Complaint Over Misuse of His Photos
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A complaint has been lodged by BRS MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan with Gadwal police station, wherein he stated that he was elected as MLA in July last year, but some persons in Gadwal with an ulterior motive are using his photographs on the flexes linking his association with the Congress party.
The MLA further stated that this act was not only misleading but it was also creating confusion. He urged Gadwal inspector to investigate the matter and take a stern action against the persons inv...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
